unnormalised: Education Technology: Scholarship Portals Bridging the Financial Gap for Indian Students
normalised: Education Technology: Scholarship Portals Bridging the Financial Gap for Indian Students

unnormalised: New Delhi – A surge in user-friendly scholarship portals is revolutionizing access to educational funding for Indian students. These platforms streamline the often-complex application process, connecting deserving candidates with numerous opportunities, both national and international.
normalised: New Delhi – A surge in user friendly scholarship portals is revolutionizing access to educational funding for Indian students. These platforms streamline the often complex application process, connecting deserving candidates with numerous opportunities, both national and international.

unnormalised: Sites like Vidya Dhan and Buddy4Study are gaining popularity, offering comprehensive databases searchable by course, category, and financial need. This is particularly crucial for students from rural areas like Bihar and Uttar Pradesh, who often lack awareness of available resources.
normalised: Sites like Vidya Dhan and Buddy four Study are gaining popularity, offering comprehensive databases searchable by course, category, and financial need. unnormalised: "The digitization of scholarship information is a game-changer," says Dr. Anjali Sharma, Professor of Education at IIT Madras. "Imagine a student from a remote village in Kerala accessing the same funding opportunities as someone in Mumbai, all thanks to these portals."
normalised: “The digitization of scholarship information is a game changer,” says Doctor Anjali Sharma, Professor of Education at I I T Madras. “Imagine a student from a remote village in Kerala accessing the same funding opportunities as someone in Mumbai, all thanks to these portals.”

unnormalised: Many portals are also incorporating AI-powered matching systems, recommending relevant scholarships based on individual profiles. This saves students considerable time and effort, allowing them to focus on academics, especially with upcoming exams and festival preparations like Onam festivities. Some even offer assistance with essay writing and interview preparation. The rise of these platforms promises to democratize education and empower future generations, ensuring financial constraints don't hinder access to quality learning. This technological advancement ensures more students can relish the 'biryani' of knowledge and opportunity.
